column3: Good location. Rooms spotless also the owner let us use her garage for our motorcycle. Breakfasts was excellent. We will return. Top marks.

Great location, walking distance from the town centre and Menin Gate. Nice roof terrace and garden. Quiet at night. Comfortable bed. Excellent breakfast.
